TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個區段包含兩個程式碼範例。The section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何自類別。The first code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何顯示`StyledTable`在設計階段的類別。The second code example demonstrates how to display the `StyledTable` class at design time. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為設計工具類別`StyledTableDesigner`，其衍生自類別，並可用來顯示兩個資料格在設計階段，衍生自類別類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a designer class named `StyledTableDesigner`, which is derived from the class, and is used to display two cells at design time for a class that is derived from the class. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用`DesignerAttribute`關聯`StyledTableDesigner`類別`StyledTable`類別，因此不會顯示在設計階段。The following code example uses the `DesignerAttribute` to associate the `StyledTableDesigner` class with the `StyledTable` class so that it can be displayed at design time. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtable.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用來在設計階段表示控制項的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可確保資料表中有至少一個資料列和資料格，而且資料格包含一些在設計階段顯示的文字。The method ensures that the table has at least one row and cell and that the cells contain some text for display at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法顯示的資料列和資料格的`StyledTable`設計介面上的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to display rows and cells for the `StyledTable` class on the design surface. 在`Try`封鎖，這個程式碼會檢查是否資料表包含任何資料列或資料格，而且如果沒有出現，請建立一個資料列，並執行迴圈來建立兩個資料格的資料列，以及要在設計階段顯示每個資料格中的預留位置文字。In the `Try` block, the code checks whether the table contains any rows or cells, and if it does not, creates a row and performs a loop to create two cells for the row, along with placeholder text to display in each cell at design time. 如果資料表不是空的但資料列，該程式碼會執行相同的迴圈來建立和填入儲存格。If the table is not empty, but a row is, the code performs the same loop to create and populate the cells. 在`Finally`區塊中，程式碼會傳回值為其原始狀態。In the `Finally` block, the code returns the values to their original state. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#2)]
